item.description:
It's expected to be freezing Sunday, so let's go South, to the South End that is, to bask in the warmth of the Southwest. If you you love a bargain and a delicious one at that, join us for Masa's Brunch Fiesta.

At this time this is open to members only....you're not allowed to invite a guest. If you include a guest in your RSVP, your RSVP will be updated to zero (0) guest.

Masa's Web Site

Masa's Brunch Menu

Driving from I-93:
Take Exit 18 to Mass Ave. Take a right onto Mass Ave. Go under the Boston Medical Center and continue through 3 traffic lights. At the 4th light take a right onto Tremont Street. Masa is 1 mile up on the left.

MBTA directions:
The Arlington stop on the green line is the closest Subway station. Exit the station onto one-way Arlington St. Follow the flow of traffic for 5 blocks past the castle and over the bridge. At the Tremont St intersection look to your right to see Masa.

The following MEMBER GUIDELINES were developed so our events run smoothly.

Our focus is on friendly and respectful gatherings while sharing a delicious meal.
Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.
Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.
Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.
If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event
and you have not attended the event, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.
If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO in less than twenty-four hours from the the event you are counted as a NO-SHOW.
If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.
NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.
If it is less than twenty-fours from the event and you are not able to attend or are running late, you must text or call me at (617) 445 -7549.
An email from you to Tonya explaining your absence or less than twenty-four hour RSVP change from YES to NO, is an expected courtesy.
If you're not sure you can attend because you have other
unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO
with a comment requesting to be placed on wait list.
If this event is full and you wish to attend, please RSVP NO with a comment to be placed on wait list.
Your feedback is appreciated, so please rate the event and venue by completing the surveys after the events.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Masa Brunch Fiesta
